content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was playing disc golf with my friends we noticed a police helicopter just flying over our area which caused us to look up. we noticed a black object square shaped with what looked like a single wing or propeller of some sort on the left side. as soon as i seen the object i immediately removed my cell phone and was fortunate to capture the event. 
i continued my game as my friends tried convincing me that it was just a weather balloon. i watched the object disappear into the clouds. the object came from the north and flew directly over our heads less than a thousand feet from the ground. it was intense.As soon as i noticed the awkwardness in shape and color and size i knew it was out of the ordinary. i was excited because i am intrigued by this sort of thing. i feel lucky to have the moment on camera and would love for this experience to be confirmed. 

this is case 62242

i was previously unable to upload my video. this is my second attempt.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witness to an odd but rather neat event

content.detailedDescription: This happened for two days in a row 5/29/2015 and 5/30/2015 i was leaving from a friends house and that is when i saw this white light just standing their and it was blinking like every 2 seconds. when my car got moving the ufo started following me. the second day this happened when i got to a stop two other lights appeared out of no where one on the left and one on the right the two other lights looked exactly the same as the ufo. once i got home the two other ufos disappeared. the ufo looked like a bright diamond blinking every two seconds. every time it was not blinking i would see a lot of green, red, and yellow lights under the ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: For about 1 mile the ufo was following my car and then when i got to a stop  two other objects appeared one on the left and one on the right this happened for two days in a row.

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a bright light bigger and bigger than other lights in sky.
not far from local airport but weren't a plant as only one white light. 
i was driving home and one second the light was to my right then a second later was to my left but in the distance. has i kept it in sight i noticed it started hovering in the distance and was a white light in a circle shadow which was stationery but no noise. then a second light appeared the same as the first light but underneath, it slowly went into the original light.
which then turned into 4 individual lights of a more square nature, they lot up one by one till all for was lit up and then the lights disappeared and the craft had vanished also.

i called my wife to let her know what i'd seen who didn't believe me as normal but only found this site today to report my sighting to.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Weird lights and pure speed

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog <exact location details have been removed to protect witness identity> at 1045 sat. evening may 30,and stopped <exact location details have been removed to protect witness identity> to roll a cigerett,so i sat down with the dog and from there the sky to the north has a good vantage point,off to my left ,nw. i saw a slow moving extreemly bright orange object that seemed to be about the size of light plane traffic heading across fron nw to ne sky traveling i beleive about franci and then appeared to change to a northern path about division street at about 1000 foot elevation,then another, 2nd object came into view where i saw the 1st one.Lokking back to object 1 it was now gone,.As the 2nd object came to the same area and turned north i saw a 3rd object apear and quickly watching the 2nd object,after turning it was dimming out to vanished in about 5 seconds,.As i watched the 3 object it folled the same flight as the 1st two,and vanished to the north also. the night is cristal clear and no bloking object to such a beautiful sight,i shure there will be other reports.
content.summary: Three bright orange lights slowly crossing north spokane sky

content.detailedDescription: Me and my daughter seen the way the sun light was cutting the clouds in pretty way she took a couple pics so i grab my phone and started snapping some pics. she said ohh your pics r better will u send me one. i flipped through to send her the best one. that's when i noticed a black dot i had no clue what is was a i said to her what if its a ufo..Lot then i looked at another it wasnt there. so i zoomed in and there it was really far away. the next picture had it closer again but at bottom of a vapor trail. the next one had it closer to plane but below another one. the next one had them ahead of the plane. within a minute this black dot travels through my pictures from close to far to back close and to the right of pictures within a minute or less the pictures are dated and timed.
content.summary: Taking pictures of sun set.Pictures have strange black dot. then meets another following a plane then leaving plane behins

content.detailedDescription: Well my mom had been talking about the strange light land behind our house but we never took her seriously until 28may 2015 wen their was no water in the tap and she want to shower in a drum that's behind the house and ask me to come withe her because the back of the house  dark while she showering am standing their going thru my messages on my phone and the phone screen did some strange colour and went blank wen i raise my head their was this bright white light hovering other cherry tree in front me thought it was my brother with a flash light but then i herd his voice in side talking to my cousin that's we i walk to wards the light and go got really bright i could not see any thing and i went blank for a few seconds then i herd my mom scream [name removed/cms/jpg] that's the light u see u see i was not lying as she said that the light lunch it self at her she scream [item removed/cms/jpg] then 2 other smaller brighter light came from behind the cherry tree i have never seen any thing move so fast and shine so bright and they still come around at after ten pm but my mom don't want us to try and catch them they always come in the same direction but takes off in any direction and shootsback up to the sky super fast here is a video
content.summary: A  beam of light down from the sky and landed on a cherry tree behind the house and then come on the ground throw it self at my mom i run in side the house to get a cutlass wen i came backit was stuck to the goat neck ans the dogs dident a

content.detailedDescription: I <exact location details have been removed to protect witness identity>  noticed what i thought was a plane on fire but it just continued to go on and radiated this flame substance all over the body and it was orange gold red flame like colors more  i <exact location details have been removed to protect witness identity> noticed what i thought was a plane on fire but it just continued to go on and radiated this flame substance all over the body and it was orange gold passed and was pretty quiet not sure if it even made noise lots of planes fly by the area but i have never in my life seen this before and there were 7 other people who saw with me and did notice the object flying straight towards the grand canyon
content.summary: Thought i saw a plane on fire

content.detailedDescription: I was carpooling with two other people, heading to school. the morning was completely dark and rainy. i sat in the back of the vehicle. as we pass s. lane ave, the driver saw the lights, and pointed them out.At first we all thought it was a plane. i figured it was probably experimental, since it did not have any flashing red, or green. they were just the four solid bright white lights. so then i'm thinking it was coming in for landing, since it made a westward turn. instead it increased speed, crossing the entire helena valley in just under two seconds. there were no flashes or cracks indicating a sonic boom. it was as if it just floated out of sight. we were too excited to pull out our phones, even if we did we still wouldn't have had the time. personally (although i'm open minded), i just want to find out if anyone else saw the thing.
content.summary: Four even spaced horizontal lights come out of the south, arcs west, crosses valley in 2 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
the event occurred at an outdoor event held at frank a. theis park near the plaza in kansas city, mo.  i was attending the even with my girlfriend, when i noticed a star-like object pulsating at a high frequency.  in relation to me, the object appeared to be ~45 deg. above the horizon to the south of my position.  it also appeared to be at great distance, and probably ex-atmospheric.  
     when i observed the object,  i wondered if it would move, and promptly upon thinking so, it did.  the craft began to move from a standstill, and traversed the sky very slowly (approx. 2.5 deg. every 60 sec); moving a total of about 25 deg.  the observation of the craft lasted about 10 mins. total, at which point it seemed to blend in with the stars and disappear.  
     i had noticed a distinct feeling about the night in general.  the moon was brighter than almost any other time i've seen it.  the stars were also unusually bright, and the sky was perfectly clear, which is unusual for the city.  when i observed the craft, it seemed to be watching the event and keeping its movements subtle to avoid detection.  
     i was able to distinguish this object from a star, a plane, or a satellite.  first, the frequency of the pulsating light was fast and irregular and seemed to change when the object began to move.  second, the object appeared at a standstill, then began to move, and later came to a stop again.  thus, its movements would clearly distinguish it from a normal satellite, because satellites are either geostationary or follow regular orbits around the earth (i.E. they don't start and stop).  third, the light was pulsating at a frequency that appeared to be 10-20 hz, which is much faster than any aircraft strobe light; aircraft strobes only flash about once every couple of seconds.  only the pulsating white light was visible; no red or green lights were seen.  therefore, it could not have been any type of conventional aircraft either.  
     this leaves two possibilities.  either the craft was an extra-terrestrial craft, or it was some type of experimental exoatmospheric man-made craft with powerful maneuvering capabilities.
content.summary: Star-like object traversed night sky; high frequency pulsing light; definitive start & stop points

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking along the american river trail, i noticed jupiter/saturn were out of place. after rigorous approximations the effort was futile and i decided to record it, regardless; two minutes of footage.

after this activity had taken place, i simply kept walking, a bright light hovered at about 100 feet from the ground. it was about six miles away. it seemed odd and there was some sort of electricity in the air. i pulled out my phone and started recording.

after reviewing the video i noticed an anomaly. a bright blue orb dashed through very close to me. by simply zooming in on the frame, one is able to see a dome shaped ufo with disk like features and an array of luminous material. a plasma sheath of sorts. 

i want to discuss any legality of said disclosure along with embedded terms and conditions before submission.
content.summary: Ufo traverses laterally at mach 24; emits indigo plasm.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out of friends house.  entered my car parked on street.  started car...Then in the air over the street in front of me, was mainly orangish blob...Semingly fairly low (hundreds of feet high maybe)...Heading southeast, then asscended very gracefully up and then southwest in arc pattern at an even non-accelerating speed.  when the second one appeared, got out of my car...Watched it follow the exact same path with identical speed...Then watched several more.  because of trees, once each glob passed clearly in front of me, the most i could see at *one time* once they diverted from se path in front of me to ascending south/southwest away from me...Was approx 5...Again, evenly spaced....Each evenly paced...No speed varisation between any of these globs.  richards gabeur air force base (supposedly many years closed) is approx 3 miles sw of the location i made this viewing.  the closest airport that might have radar of my location would be lee's summit (mo) airport...Approx 15 miles east.  the experience made me smile and get goose bumps.  totally exhillerating...It finally happened to me!!
content.summary: Mainly orangish glow..Perfectly ascending arc pattern...13+ units evenly spaced

content.detailedDescription:
I did not really know what this light was but took pictures just for the hell of it. when i looked back at what i had taken i realized this is very unusual. this object morphed into a boomerang shape that wasn't seen with the naked eye till you look at the pictures. there were two other objects but they were much further away. they didn't really show up in my pictures but they are there for someone who knows what they are doing to pull out. the one that was closest has a lot of potential and the different pictures of it shows it changing shapes. i couldn't see this going on with the naked eye. only after reviewing the pictures did i see this. i don't want any attention i just like for someone to see what i have caught on my phone. i could not follow the object any longer there was a cloud bank and it was out of sight.
my feeling about this is i was curious, then got excited kind of then frustrated that i could not see more details but could tell the detail is there.
content.summary: Sitting on deck about 9:00 pm listening to outdoor concert playing across river. while listening to music i saw a plane fly overhead shortly afterwards i saw a very bright light. it was to low to be a star. i then got my phone and took picturesl

content.detailedDescription: We were watching a movie on television. we say a light that looked like a fireworks rocket outside our window.Rocket type of fireworks. the object kept rising above our neighbors tree then rose well above the tree and took off to a higher elevation looking like it was on fire.That's exactly what we thought was going on with this craft.It almost stopped for a few seconds then  it kept climbing toward our moon and vered toward the south very sharply went up and just vanished.Shock and awe ,in my 68 years on this earth myself and my wife still are in shock and still discussing it with our family.My son was over at this time and watched this as well and was also amazed.The object went up at a higher elevation toward the clouds south and just disappeared.We were expecting thunderstorms all evening in wny but none in our area occurred.We  just had slight cloud cover where we could see the moon and no wind at all.We at first thought the object was fireworks then thought that it could be a helicopter but it made no sounds at all.Frankly we do not know what this was.I am along with my wife and son still confused at all that went on  this evening.We have several pictures on our digital camera i do not know how to transfer to the computer.They have been saved so they are still on file in the camera
content.summary: We thought that this was fireworks because it was rising,climed and went going over my home almost straight up.Then slowed down and appered to be stationary for awile the took off south going further and was gone;vanished.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I had been watering the back lawn around 5:12pm.Pst. i sat in my chair and notice a clear object flying south to north i was facing the east at the same time a jet blue was flying higher than the object, westwardly.The object then changed its shape , it then resembled the usmc 4 propeller helicopter but still clear plastic like, at that time it flew fast in a circle then north and south fast then when i focused more it somewhat faded invisible so i thought it was gone but it reappeared and begin hovering in the same spot for  a short while. i got up step into the yard looking at this object then all of a sudden it flew southwest a very short distance hesitated a fraction of a second changed forms from it's present appearance to a clear stealth or large phantom jet like shape but cleared the first plastic  with borders that reflected the craft, then it  rapidly flew westward like mark 35 or more. please note that  while typing this report it reappeared  for a second or two before my video could capture it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 1st clear sq ball. 2nd clear sq helicopter isn't 4pplrs 3rd clear shape like a large fighter jet flew west fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving in the plains of forest grove oregon with a friend and about 8 pm on september 19th, 2014. all of the sudden my friend spots a big bright circular light in the sky, just stationary a little bit above the horizon. as we watch it, about one minute later it splits into three orbs, all the same size and shape. they make a triangle, one on bottom and the other two even split on top. then it split from 4 circles to 5 circles to 6 circles in no uniform pattern, this happened over the course of about 4-5 minutes. then the 6 orbs/circles stayed stationary in the air until we drove out of view about 5-8 minutes later.
content.summary: Saw a bright orb in the sky split into a perfect traingle or three orbs then it kept splitting off into eventually 6 perfectly round orbs

content.detailedDescription:
At 1530, 29 may 2015, my two roommates (a & s) and i were sitting in the back yard together, chatting idly. the day was warm, dry, with high cirriform clouds or mist of unusual extent and texture resembling at times wool or inverted sand dunes. i was facing eastward.  
at approximately 1540, i looked up to the east-northeast to see a singularly bright "star" or "planet" at about 40 degrees above local horizon, to which i brought the attention of a and s. it shone steadily with a bright white light that easily shone through but did not cast light on the intervening clouds. a and i watched continuously for two hours as the object rose to approximately zenith. numerous passenger and mail jets passed on a plane below the cloud film and several left lingering trails. during this time, it seemed to variously take on a slightly oblong, cometary, or oscillating appearance which, without the aid of binocular or telescopic aid, we are forced to attribute to a trick of the eye. our observations agree on this point.
at this point, we all left the house by car and observed the object from several locations in windsor and santa rosa (mendocino and college). we pointed the object out to several people in different locations, who all thought that it might be different objects ranging from balloons to venus.
we returned home about 2030, at which point, the daily heavier clouds and fog began to roll in from the ocean, at times partially or fully obscuring the object which, at this point was about 40 degrees above the horizon and setting. at about 2200, the object was lost behind heavy cloud cover which quickly progressed to overcast skies.
the object was a very bright white and did not change in apparent magnitude relative to the position of the sun. it was visible while the sun was high in the sky, suggesting a magnitude of at least -7. its angular velocity seemed to be somewhat greater than the sun, perhaps a bit less than that of the moon. it did not travel along the line of the ecliptic as the planets do, but took a path to the north of it, perhaps crossing the ecliptic at its northernmost node. ruled out venus, mercury, jupiter, saturn, near-earth asteroids, balloons, and man-made satellites as possible misidentifications. i have been an amateur astronomer and meteorologist for over 20 years and am confident in these determinations.
i have attached photographs recorded with an iphone 5c between the hours of 2037 and 2102 during the sighting. roommate a has more pictures and video on his iphone 6.
content.summary: Very bright, planet-like temporary satelliteobserved over santa rosa, ca, over 6 hours

content.detailedDescription: I was waiting for my son and grandson outside barrow county education administration building in parking lot. i noticed 3 jet contrails and a sun dog next to one of them. i took a few photos of the sky and found they object in one of the photos 15-20 seconds after taking picture. it was gone when i tried to film it again. i didn't know the object was there until after i took the picture. i never saw it leave. i'm still puzzled. it was not a plane, helicopter, balloon or swamp gas. it's bothered me constantly since i took the picture. i still have it in my phone and computer.
content.summary: Was taking photo of sun dog. noticed object in photo above horizon

content.detailedDescription:
May 24, 2015: sighting in private valley in foothills of the great smoky mountains near maryville, tn during pig roast at around 1:30am. at the firepit with 4 other friends listening to acoustic music, i was surprised when a bright light lit up the area, at first wondering why a car was coming up the hill driveway with bright lights on. but i immediately realized it wasn't a car because of no noise and the light was too bright. i turned around to my friends who were exclaiming, "what was that?" and i said, "yes, what in the world was that?" 

apparently, a flat object flew over the small valley, and created a bright blue-white light flash illumination with no sound. one of my friends clearly saw the flat object and it's path over the valley, one saw the object out of the corner of his eye disappear with flash beyond the tree line. we all saw the brilliant blue-white light flash lighting up the valley. there was no crash or explosion! we are all still in agreement that it was not natural..I.E. meteorite. no reports of meteorite crashing or burning up in area. 

several days after our incident, a new crop circle was discovered in gray, tn which is 123 mis. straight from maryville. this is the second crop circle to be formed in the same field location: first one discovered may 13, 2013. i attached the crop circle photos to this report.
content.summary: Sighting in private valley during pig roast at 1:30am. flat object flew over valley, bright blue-white light illuminated valley. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking through a field with my dog. it was a warm day without a cloud in the sky and hardly any wind and no one around that i could see. i crossed the river on the stepping stones. i remember being cross that i'd fallen off a stone and my right foot was now wet through. i continued up the quite steep path that took me from the river up the side of a hill. i gradually became aware that everything was really quiet, in fact there was complete silence. i couldn't even hear the river and that struck me as strange as it is an area i know very well and i know that i should be able to hear it. 
my dog was doing her best to slip out of her collar to go chase rabbits when she suddenly stopped and ran behind me and cowered behind me, shaking like id never seen her shake before. that was when i heard the pulsing hum, very quiet at first, like hearing someone's headphones as they walk past you but it got louder and louder. it seemed to fill my head and i remember it made my ears itch inside. i was looking around me trying to see what the noise was. i thought maybe it was the forestry guys cutting trees but no chainsaw sounds like that. i could feel it spreading through my whole body, really strong pulses of hums and buzzes. i remember feeling very agitated and nervous and incredibly thirsty so i reached for my water bottle in my pocket. and that's the last thing i remember until i opened my eyes and to my horror i was laying on the ground, it was pitch black, raining heavily, my dog was nowhere to be seen. 
i saw flashes of white light passing me on my right hand side and suddenly realised i was laying on tarmac underneath something large as i was completely dry but everything around me was soaking wet. a bright light shone in my eyes and i heard a voice asking if i was ok. it turned out that the voice belonged to a lorry driver who had pulled into a lay-by on the motorway to eat his late night snack. before he had set off again he had checked under his vehicle as he'd previously hurt a cat that had taken shelter some weeks before. he helped me into the cab of his truck and have me a drink of tea and a chocolate bar. he then asked me if i needed help and could he take me somewhere safe. he said he was heading to leeds so i asked if i could hitch a ride with him. we looked for my dog but in the dark there was no sign of her so i reluctantly agreed to leave. i told the lorry driver everything that i remembered up until him finding me. i looked at the clock in the lorry cab and it said 3:46am so i looked at my watch but it had stopped at 11:07am. i didn't say another word and made my way home from the lorry drivers depot in a taxi in a state of complete bewilderment. 
i didn't tell anyone about the most frightening experience of my life until i met my fianc√©. he laughed at me and said i must be mad or high. i've never taken any mind altering substances other than alcohol and i was completely sober - i was 17 at the time. 
i don't even know if i was abducted as i have no recollection of anything other than i have described above. all i know is i was walking my dog in the sunshine and then i wake up laying under a lorry over 12 hours later 50 miles from where i started. 
i know i'm not mad. i know what i heard and felt but no-one will take me seriously. even the faintest buzzing noise now makes me feel so panicked and on edge. 

thank you for taking the time to share my experience with me. maybe, just maybe, one day i'll find out what really did happen. 

yours faithfully 

anna sheard
content.summary: Missing time and distance

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were outside on our deck this afternoon, enjoying the nice weather. we saw a plane and then immediately in the same area of the sky saw a strange object. the object was bizarre in that it had no distinct shape and completely unidentifiable. while still keeping eyes on the ufo, we then immediately observed a 2nd plane pass through the same area of the sky. this second plane that went by during the sighting made us realize how strange and different the unidentified object indeed was. we followed the trajectory of the ufo until it went out of sight. it changed shape so many times that it is difficult to describe the object. the colors we observed were mainly silver, some red and white. at times the ufo would change shape to a tiny ball, then expand back out to other strange configurations. the ufo went basically to the direct east of our home the entire duration of the sighting. we moved down to the yard toward the end of the sighting to get a better view between the trees. eventually we completely lost sight of it in the blue sky to the east. when we returned to the deck, we saw a third plane pass through the exact same area of the sky where we had originally seen the ufo and the other 2 planes.
unable to obtain a decent picture, given the brightness of the summer sun and height of the object and planes.
content.summary: Wife and i observed an object above our home for about 12 minutes, moved directly east, changed shape several times, eventually out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: I was hosting the annual family thanksgiving celebration at my home as has been the case for some 14 years now. following dinner i went outside after cleaning dishes to get some air while my family played tv games inside.  i suddenly witnessed a bright red/orange ball of light moving from the e to n in a straight line while standing on the stairs on my front porch.  it seemed to pulsate or be "on fire".  it was more red than orange and circular but a bit elongated. at first i thought it was the radio tower, which is in the area but i realized with the lights movement, it was clearly not that. there was no sound.  the light seemed quite low to the ground, however my perception of depth was clouded by the darkness. i called to my family to come see it, but by the time my sister came outside the light had disappeared behind the trees. she went back inside & i remained wondering what i had just seen. i did feel that somehow it saw me.  i'm not sure why i felt this way.  i remember wishing it would come back so my sister could see it.  then it happened. i saw a second light (orb) which was the same size and color as the first.  it was moving in the same direction, from the same starting place as the first(seeming to follow the first light).  i called to my sister again, "you have to come out here now, there's another one!"  this time my sister made it outside in time to witness this second light before it also disappeared behind the trees.  neither of us could identify the light.  i was so relieved that she saw it.  i thought i had lost my mind.  to this day i do not know what i saw and actually want to have help eliminating all human possibilities.  i was born in mount shasta and am accustomed to strange things in the area and around the mountain, but never have i seen anything like this before.  there have been rumors that the military is testing in the area(for some years now) and i have seen strange craft in the area before, but never orbs until now.  did it hear me when i wished it to come back just before the second light appeared?  was it the same light or a second one? these are questions i want to ask and at the same time am afraid to get the answers to.
content.summary: Saw one bright orb light move ne to approx 5 min then a second orb followed behind it same area and direction after the first was gone

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i was on a drive into idaho to take photos of old barns. we were traveling north about the city of preston when i looked into the sky and saw a 747 leaving a chemtrail and directly parallel to the plane was something like erasing the sky and the clouds almost like it was tracking the 747. i stopped the car and got out so i could focus better on the event. when i got out i noticed another plane start to climb real rapidly near where the 747 was and noticed an object that was not a plane ascending into the clouds. the size of this object was so large, you could have placed 7 747 wing tip to wing tip inside the diameter and still had room. when i tried to get a picture of it, it took off and disappeared leaving a hole in the cloud. we did manage to get video of the other anomaly. i am not one to admit that i saw a ufo or want any attention for what i saw. the rest of the ride home my brain was confused and tired from what i saw, i know what i saw but had a hard time admitting it to myself. upon our return home we learned about some geese that fell from the sky near where we were and tried to google pictures or videos of what we saw and haven't had much luck. i can't definitively state that what we saw caused the death to the geese but it is very coincidental. i honestly don't know why i am contacting you especially two and half months later but i will upload our video and you can decide. if you notice in the videos you can see almost an eraser type phenomena happening in the clouds parallel to the 747.  sorry if this is a waste of your time and thank you for checking it out. sincerely x
content.summary: My wife and children were on a drive heading north into idaho to take pictures of old barns. we got into the preston area and i looked into the sky to see a 747 airplane leaving a chemtrail and parallel to it was something making an eraser type mark

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was at home in clinton township, mi on may 27, 2015 looking northwest into macomb township, mi. i was taking pictures of a severe storm in my area with my nikon d3100 camera. this storm had a wall cloud and was also producing a funnel cloud at 3:35 pm est.  i took consecutive pictures of this wall cloud.  after the storm passed, i looked at the pictures taken. i found after adding contrast and brightness to them, some had an unexplainable object that should not be there.
the object was a white pencil or tube shaped craft that was directly under and advancing with this wall cloud.  it is near the top and middle of the wall cloud picture.  the next picture of this object was harder to spot, but i found it in the top, right hand side and in with the white clouds.  it held it's position in altitude (maybe advanced a bit upward at a point) and continued to fly from west to east with this storm.  i have back to back pictures of this object doing this and there was only 40/100's (less than half of a second) between pictures, but the distance it covered was miles apart.

i then changed my view to look toward the west (almost due west).  i started taking pictures of the wall cloud advancing from this direction.  when i looked at the pictures from this position, i found this object (again) under this westerly portion of the wall cloud (underneath the power/phone lines).  it was closer and lower in altitude.   the difference in time between pictures from the northwest and the west was less than 3 seconds.

i have included some pictures of this event.  i have sent copies the original photos (not enhanced and enhanced).  the copies of the originals are there to see as they appeared through the lens of my nikon camera.  during enhancements, i only added/reduced contrast, brightness, sharpness and cropped them to make the object appear easier to see.  i didn't alter or add to any of these pictures other than what i said i enhanced. 
  
i have witnessed and photographed this kind of craft in the past and it always seems to be traveling with the severe weather (wall clouds to be exact).   
this is the third time in less than 3 years i have photographed these types of objects. although i can't see them when i am shooting pictures, some of the pictures i've taken, clearly indicate that something is there and is persuing these intense storms.  last year it was a dark gray/black in color and the year before, it was a light gray.  

thank you for taking the time to look at this object.  i have these photos and others from the past if you would like to see them.  contact me if you would like more information on these past photos.
content.summary: Ufo travelling with a wall cloud during a severe storm in clinton township, mi.

content.detailedDescription: I live in edgewater and was on the river path that night, on the south side of the river, walking with my wife. i too saw something odd to the south south west. i at first thought it was venus, untill i located venus off about 15 degrees further south. i then observed the object was in motion (i had been walking and may have missed motion at first as i was sure it was just venus). it then went up, down, to the west a bit, and then zipped off to the east with rapid acceleration moving low on the horizon and passing below venus. i lost sight of it behind the trees and buildings at that point. my wife and i then went home, missing the lighting of the river, so i can say this all happoned about 5 or 10 min before they lit the river (st. joe, east race) which was lit at about 10:20pm est.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Short sighting of venus like object.  possibly the same object reported in case# 65791

content.detailedDescription: I am 46 years old and i reside in port arthur, tx. in 1979 0r 1980 im thinking it was the month of december at around 8:30 pm after dark, my step father, [name removed/dr/cms] and i were driving east on 25th street toward 9th ave to a local grocery store called weingarten. midway on 25th st. between memorial blvd and 9th ave. on 25th we noticed several cars pulled over on the right side of the street headed east. several people, adults and children were standing outside their cars looking and pointing up. my step father then pulled over on the right side as well to see what was going on. and as we step out our car to my amazement was to most extraordinary thing i have ever witnessed. hovering over a neighborhood of homes on the right side of the road was this circular object with multi colored lights dancing and blinking around it! from what i can remember the lights were red, blue and green. it's hard for me to recount how high up this object was and even how large it was. maybe the size of a small car, i really cant say. i had to be between 10 and 12 years old. one thing i can say is that their were many adults out there witnessing this event and i do remember that none of them including my step father could not make logic of what this thing was. at that time even as a child i did have enough sense to know that it wasn't a helicopter! it would've been close enough to be able to hear propeller blades, plus it was not bouncing or moving!..It wasnt a blimp! we would have been able to see the balloon. and it definantly wasn't an airplane. they don't hover to my knowledge. the only thing that moving on that vehicle were the magnificent lights! after about ten or fifteen minutes of watching this ufo my step father said we had to get to the store. my only regret is not being able to see how this object moved on. we left before it did!
content.summary: Hard to tell the color of the object..It only appeared circular and had multi colored lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from vacation. the plane started to reduce flight.
i took a few pictures by my phone because of nice clouds around.
i did not see anything special. i did not notice ufo.
when i got home i started watching photos i took.
then i have noticed thin line at the picture i have sent you.
when i zoomed in at the end of this line i have realized that this is 
something unusual.

important - attached original photo should be seen on display with pixel density at least 300.
content.summary: Cigar shaped ufo caught unconsciously from plane.

content.detailedDescription: You can look it up on you tube a lot of people seen the crash from the bar next door and drivers seen it they tryed saying it was a built of lighting but it was round and also make a big splash in the ocean and if it was a built of lighting why would they bring out navey and coast gared recker ships i watch your show all the time and i know this has to be a cover up thank you hope you guys look in to this one
content.summary: A bright flash, followed by the descent of a large, bluish-silver, bullet-shaped object, which plummeted into the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: We were just taking pictures of unusual clouds and afterwards noticed a square object ejecting out of clouds then noticed what looks like a giant transparent eyeball.  just thought it was unusual and may interest you.
content.summary: We were just taking pictures of unusual clouds and afterwards noticed a square object ejecting out of clouds then noticed what looks like a giant transparent eyeball.

content.detailedDescription:
What i saw driving over the 520 bridge right now. the bridge is dark and there are low/no lights in the area because of its affluence and above the stadium (stadium is background). i was driving and my riders (i'm an uber driver) and heading west toward seattle and it was completely dark. all of the sudden out of no where, i saw a huge (without knowing how to describe it) meteor or similar go across the sky at a rate of a 5 count using your arm extended from left to right.  it was 100m above laurelhurst and glowed green. as it shot across it look like a triangle with white phosphorus front edge because of all the sparks flying across the front. it was extremely visible the distance was 3/4 thousand feet but in front (above) of the uw stadium. it was very radiant and  in the middle it glowed very emerald distinctive darkish green (so much so that the water and trees also glowed as it streaked) and had a comets tail the length of my index finger (including the front). the size would be a golf ball outside my wind screen about a couple feet out.. the trajectory was north eastish based on what i could tell in the direction i was going and it looked like it could crash in north seattle to almost lynwood because it was losing altitude.

the most interesting thing was that its speed was fast, but not meteor fast and at that distance would actually be quite slow. my riders didn't see it because they were drinking, but when i screamed "look", they were trying to find it, but it crested the horizon.

what i can say is that the clarity of the object was amazing and the color was pretty spectacular. in the triangle was a dark green, outer triangle whitish green, the comet look in front of it like something entering the atmosphere was white phosphorus and sparking like a welders tool against metal and the tail was white.

i never posted like this before, but please tell me that i wasn't the only person to see this!
content.summary: Looked like a comet, but wasn't

content.detailedDescription: I had woke up at about 3 am in the morning seen a bright light outside my window walked out onto my porch and looked up to see where the light was coming from and then i seen it fly over my neighbors houses moving real slow not making a sound at a steady speed no trails or fire behind the ship but it was clearly a triangle shape with 3 lights under neath the ship no sounds black with white lights
content.summary: Triangle shape with 3 lights under neath the ship no sounds black with white lights
